Prison Boss VR

Coming in july to the HTC Vive


Watch trailer

What is Trebuchet?

It's the most advanced siege weapon ever made, able to launch 90 kilograms projectiles over a distance of 300 meters...

And a brand new VR studio based in Montreal, QC. We are currently working hard to finish our first project, a crafting and trading game for the HTC Vive, Prison Boss VR.
